body:
I got your PR working on the extensions page with two changes:

1. Set the default value for the `errors` prop in `BaseAntForm` to an empty object. This is a leftover bug from the eslint changes that will go away when `BaseAntForm.js` is replaced by `forms.js` in #859.
2. Set `CSRF_COOKIE_HTTPONLY` to False. Ideally this should only be on writable admin nodes; read-only ones should not bother setting CSRF stuff at all.

I also had to clear my cookies for this to work, as the existing CSRF cookie was prevent Django from setting a new one with `httponly` set to False.
